title: 58 major medical groups call for vaccine mandate for all health, long-term care workers
author: ADAM FORGIE; Sinclair Broadcast Group
description: WASHINGTON (SBG) — Nearly 60 major national medical groups call for all health care and long-term care employers nationwide to mandate COVID-19 vaccines for every employee. The groups say vaccination is "the primary way" to avoid future lockdowns and mandates from various governments, so Americans can "put the pandemic behind us. "
